entry.title: Monday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 24 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 31 with temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill minus 44 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023
